original: Start by picking a DIFFICULTY for your playthrough
translate: Start by picking a DIFFICULTY for your playthrough

original: Are you sure you want to abort?
translate: Are you sure you wish to abort?

original: Difficulty can be changed during play
translate: The Difficulty can be adjusted during play

original: The Main Attribute for this Class is Strength
translate: The Main Attribute for this Class is Strength

original: May use all weapons of type Blade, Axe, Club and Bow
translate: May use all weapons of the types Blade, Axe, Club, and Bow

original: Next, select a CLASS for your character!
translate: Next, select a CLASS for your character!

original: Classes define a character's role in the party by adding certain exclusive abilities
translate: Classes define a character's role in the party by adding certain exclusive abilities

original: Development Points are gained when leveling up and used to buy ranks in Feats
translate: Development Points are gained when leveling up, spent to acquire ranks in Feats

original: This unlocks new Abilities for the Character making them more powerful
translate: This unlocks new Abilities for the Character making them more powerful

original: The Main Attribute is the Attribute that is the most important for this Class
translate: The Main Attribute is the Attribute that is the most important for this Class

original: A measure of a character's brawn and physical power
translate: A measure of a character's brawn and physical power

original: Indicates how much of the game’s Magic resource, Attunement, is gained every time the character levels up
translate: Indicates how much of the game’s Magic resource, Attunement, is gained every time the character levels up

original: Indicates how much of the game’s Hitpoint resource, Vitality, is gained every time the character levels up
translate: Indicates how much of the game’s Hitpoint resource, Vitality, is gained every time the character levels up

original: The Bard mixes the Rogue’s decent combat skills and high maneuverability with the use of arcane magic
translate: The Bard mixes the Rogue’s combat skills and high manoeuvrability with the use of arcane magics

original: The Main Attribute for this Class is Presence
translate: The Main Attribute for this Class is Presence

original: May use Light and Medium weapons of type Blade, Axe, Club and Bow
translate: May use Light and Medium weapons of the types Blade, Axe, Club, and Bow

original: The Rogue combines important non-combat skills with a large damage output against single targets
translate: The Rogue combines important non-combat skills with a large damage output against single targets

original: Unlike other Magi, they also get access to a few basic combat-related Feats and may wear light armor
translate: Unlike other Magi, they also get access to a few basic combat-related Feats and may wear light armour

original: The Main Attribute for this Class is Intellect
translate: The Main Attribute for this Class is Intellect

original: May use Light weapons of type Blade, Club and Bow
translate: May use Light weapons of the types Blade, Club and Bow

original: The Champion is a Cleric who excels in the use of blades and armor whilst still having limited divine spell-casting abilities
translate: The Champion is a Cleric who excels in the use of blades and armour whilst still having limited divine spell-casting abilities

original: May use all weapons of type Blade and Club
translate: May use all weapons of the types Blade and Club

original: This comes at the cost of having absolutely no combat related Feats
translate: This comes at the cost of having absolutely no combat related Feats whatsoever

original: A Hierophant is a Cleric who can develop all the different Divine Spell Schools fully
translate: A Hierophant is a Cleric who can develop all the different Divine Spell Schools fully

original: May use Light and Medium weapons of type Club
translate: May use Light and Medium weapons of the type Club

original: The Hospitaller is a Cleric who serves as a front line healer
translate: The Hospitaller is a Cleric who serves as a front line healer

original: Well armed and armored, they can stand their ground against overwhelming foes whilst also getting access to the highest tiers of the Body Magic School
translate: Well-armed and well-armoured, they can stand their ground against overwhelming foes whilst also getting access to the highest tiers of the Body Magic School

original: The Officer is a skilled warrior who serves as a force multiplier through their tactical skills
translate: The Officer is a skilled warrior who serves as a force multiplier through their tactical skills

original: Issuing orders across the battlefield, they vastly improve the performance of their fellow party-members
translate: Issuing orders across the battlefield, they vastly improve the performance of their fellow party-members

original: The Ranger is a Warrior specializing in ranged combat and with access to limited nature magic
translate: The Ranger is a Warrior specializing in ranged combat and with access to limited nature magic

original: The Thief is a Rogue who uses Stealth to set up devestating Backstab attacks
translate: The Thief is a Rogue who uses Stealth to set up devastating Backstab attacks

original: The Main Attribute for this Class is Agility
translate: The Main Attribute for this Class is Agility

original: In particular it determines if NPCs notice the party as it moves around
translate: In particular it determines if NPCs notice the party as it moves around

original: A measure of hand-eye coordination, nimbleness and dexterity
translate: A measure of hand-eye coordination, nimbleness and dexterity

original: A character that has activated the Ability to Backstab will automatically perform Backstabbing Attacks against opponents that are either Flanked or Vulnerable
translate: A character that has activated the Ability to Backstab will automatically perform Backstabbing Attacks against opponents that are either Flanked or Vulnerable

original: A successful Backstab Attack adds the character’s Backstab Bonus Multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit Modifier to the damage roll
translate: A successful Backstab Attack adds the character’s Backstab Bonus Multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit Modifier to the damage roll

original: A character can be Flanked if opponents occupy the tile above and below it or to the left and right of it
translate: A character can be Flanked if opponents occupy the tiles either above and below it or to the left and right of it

original: Attacking a Flanked target allows the Attacker to add their Flanking Bonus to the Attack Roll
translate: Attacking a Flanked target allows the Attacker to add their Flanking Bonus to the Attack Roll

original: If a successful Backstab Attack is performed, this Attribute is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit multiplier and added to the total Damage
translate: If a successful Backstab Attack is performed, this Attribute is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit multiplier and added to the total Damage

original: A Vulnerable character cannot defend themselves
translate: A Vulnerable character cannot defend themselves

original: This makes them much easier to hit and it also means they can be Backstabbed
translate: This makes them much easier to hit and it also means they can be Backstabbed

original: A Warrior is a front-line fighter who can take and deal large amounts of damage
translate: A Warrior is a front-line fighter who can take and deal large amounts of damage

original: A character's ability to read and react to the surrounding environment and people
translate: A character's ability to read and react to the surrounding environment and people

original: The Cleric offers close-range support to their party through close ranged buffs and restorative spells
translate: The Cleric offers close-range support to their party through buffs and restorative spells

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Body magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Body magic spells you may cast

original: By studying different Schools of Spellcasting, a character gains Spell Tiers in that School
translate: By studying different Schools of Spellcasting, a character gains Spell Tiers in that School

original: Spell Tiers qualify a character to learn spells and different spells have different Tier requirements
translate: Spell Tiers qualify a character to learn spells and different spells have different Tier requirements

original: The Magos is a ranged strikers that can cast powerful, and often destructive, spells
translate: The Magos is a user of magic that casts powerful and often destructive spells from a distance

original: Mental acuity, recall and analytical skill
translate: Mental acuity, recall, and analytical skill

original: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Fire magic spells you may cast
translate: The value of this attribute indicates the highest Spell Tier of Fire magic spells you may cast

original: You claim a connection with the divine that goes far deeper than most
translate: You claim a connection with the divine that goes far deeper than most

original: Whether legitimate of not, you’re always ready to dispense holy wisdom; Be it Imperial gospel or the profane ramblings of the heretic
translate: Whether legitimate of not, you’re always ready to dispense holy wisdom; Be it Imperial gospel or the profane ramblings of the heretic

original: Select a BACKGROUND for your character
translate: Select a BACKGROUND for your character

original: BACKGROUNDS add points in skills, influence starting conditions and narrative content
translate: BACKGROUNDS add points in skills, influence starting conditions and narrative content

original: Your time spent kissing noble arses has made you a master of navigating the cut-throat politics of the Imperial lay-courts
translate: Your sycophant brown-nosing of nobles has granted you both experience in the diplomatic world of the Imperial lay-courts and an acute ability to read the subtle body language of others

original: An individual of old blood, you learned long ago that wealth and connections tend to open doors that are otherwise closed to the filthy masses
translate: An descendant of a pure-blooded heritage, it's second nature to you that having sufficient wealth and knowing how to properly display it avoid many obstacles; the same guard who bows and opens the castle gates to you slams it shut to the filthy beggar

original: Diplomacy is used to lie, bargain or sway others in negotiations
translate: Diplomacy is used in negotiations, bargaining, duplicity, and to generally convince others

original: The ability to notice small details and hidden things
translate: The ability to notice small details and otherwise hidden things

original: You are an esteemed member of the Empire’s teeming underworld with a special knack for getting in and out of places you shouldn’t be
translate: You are an esteemed member of the Empire’s teeming underworld with a special knack for getting in and out of places you shouldn’t be

original: Used to pick locks and pockets as well as to steal from shops
translate: Used to pick locks, lift pockets, and steal from shops

original: In equal parts despised and adored by the wealthy of the Empire, the traveling entertainer can make a pretty penny off their blinding charisma and nimble fingers
translate: In equal parts despised and adored by the wealthy of the Empire, the travelling entertainer can make a pretty penny off their blinding charisma and– versatile prestidigitation

original: A member of the ‘old breed’; forged and tempered by the hardships of soldiering
translate: A member of the ‘old breed’; forged and tempered by the hardships of soldiering

original: You now belong to the ever-growing fraternity of fellow men and women with scarred bodies and broken minds who roam the Empire in search for a quiet piece of land to call home
translate: You now belong to the ever-growing fraternity of fellow men and women with scarred bodies and broken minds who roam the Empire in search for a quiet piece of land to call home

original: A bonus in pounds added to the character’s Carrying Capacity
translate: A bonus in pounds added to the character’s Carrying Capacity

original: Like so many of the Empires young and promising, you were recruited into guild service at a fairly early age
translate: Like so many of the Empires young and promising, you were pressed into recruitment of guild services at a fairly early age

original: As the saying goes, work for the illustrious guilds tends to leave you with 'gold in your purse and blood on your hands'
translate: As the saying goes, work for the illustrious guilds tends to leave you with "gold in your purse and blood on your hands"

original: Crafting is used when creating items at crafting stations
translate: Crafting is used when creating items at crafting stations

original: You’ve spent years toiling under the oppressive yoke of hard labor
translate: You’ve spent years toiling under the oppressive yoke of hard labor

original: Though it may not have left you with much coin in your pocket, it has given you an unnatural resistance to hardship
translate: Though it may not have left you with much coin in your pocket, it has given you an unnatural resistance to hardship

original: The character’s ability to withstand adverse physical effects such as disease and poison
translate: The character’s ability to withstand adverse physical effects such as disease and poison

original: You have served one of the holy orders of the Empire from the safety of one of its walled monastic communities
translate: You have served one of the holy orders of the Empire from the safety of one of its walled monastic communities

original: Pray the world has not grown too cruel in your absence
translate: Pray the world has not grown too cruel in your absence

original: Healing is used in camp to increase the rate of wound recovery for wounded characters
translate: Healing is used in camp to increase the rate of Wound recovery

original: It also influences the amount of vitality regained from healing potions and is used in dialogue tests when dealing with medical issues and such
translate: It also influences the amount of vitality regained from healing potions and represents a characters medical knowledge and proficiency in dialogue tests

original: Vitality describes the amount of damage a character can take before becoming seriously wounded
translate: Vitality describes the amount of damage a character can take before they begin taking Wounds damage, where they begin becoming seriously wounded

original: Vitality is fairly easily regained through the use of consumable items and spells
translate: Vitality may be regained through the use of consumable items and spells

original: You’ve spent years across the seas, living with the desert nomads
translate: Seas of water, seas of sand; you've wandered each for many winters

original: Though ever the outsider, the nomads deemed you trust-worthy enough to become an initiate in the mysteries of their pagan fire-worship
translate: Though ever the outsider, the nomads deemed you trust-worthy enough to become an initiate in the mysteries of their pagan fire-worship

original: Damage Resistance reduces incoming Damage of the indicated type by a percentage amount equal to the attribute value
translate: Damage Resistance reduces incoming Damage of the indicated type by a percentage amount equal to the attribute value

original: A value of 100% or higher means immunity to this damage type
translate: A value of 100% or higher means immunity to this damage type

original: A negative value means a vulnerability to the damage type
translate: A negative value results in a vulnerability to the indicated damage type

original: If this is the case, incoming Damage will be increased
translate: If this is the case, incoming Damage will be increased

original: You’ve heard the call of the Mother of Maelstroms and salt water now runs in your veins
translate: You’ve heard the call of the Mother of Maelstroms and saltwater now runs in your veins

original: Whether on the deck of a Guilder caravel or manning the sails of a meager fishing sloop, you feel most at home when you’re at sea
translate: Whether on the deck of a Guilder caravel or manning the sails of a meager fishing sloop, you feel most at home when you’re at sea

original: With the once-mighty legions of the Empire in decline, this is an age of sellswords and mercenaries
translate: With the once-mighty legions of the Empire in decline, this is an age of sellswords and mercenaries

original: There is no shortage of those willing to pay professionals to wreak violence on others and you are very good at your job
translate: There is no shortage of those willing to pay professionals to wreak violence on others; professionals such as yourself

original: Writhing with serpents in darkened cellars and hidden temples has left you immune to the snake’s kiss
translate: Writhing with serpents in darkened cellars and hidden temples has left you immune to the snake’s kiss

original: Resistance to a condition represents the percentage chance to avoid contracting the condition
translate: Resistance to a condition represents the percentage chance to avoid contracting said condition

original: An attribute value of 100% or above means immunity to the condition in question
translate: An attribute value of 100% or above equates to an immunity to said condition

original: Spending your formative years fending for yourself on the hard streets of the Empire’s sprawling cities has left you with a preternatural instinct for surviving
translate: Spending your formative years fending for yourself on the hard streets of the Empire’s sprawling cities has left you with a preternatural instinct for surviving

original: No crime is too petty - no meat too mysterious
translate: no crime is too petty - no meat too mysterious

original: Initiative determines who goes first in combat
translate: Initiative determines the order in which units take their turn in combat
Learned in the ways of Alexander, you have perfected the noble art of problem solving through decisive action; by cutting the knot instead of untangling it

original: You have perfected the noble art of solving problems with brute force
Weapon Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated Weapon type
translate: Weapon Damage bonuses increase the Damage dealt when using the indicated Weapon type

original: Having spent most of your teenage years’ on the road, you are a free spirit with no allegiance to any one person or place
translate: Having spent most of your teenage years on the road, you are a free spirit with no allegiance to any one person or place

original: Drifting from place to place, you go where there is work, food and a warm bed to be had
translate: Drifting from place to place, you go where there is work, food and a warm bed to be had

original: Survival is used to forage for food, navigate difficult overland terrain and also determines a character's general knowledge of nature
translate: Survival is used when foraging, navigating difficult overland terrain; and represents the insight a character has in the ways of nature

original: As the light of civilization fades, the vast wildernesses of the Empire encroach on the civilized folk
translate: The candlelit libraries of civilisation bleed into the vast wilderness that surround it

original: Thankfully you don’t count yourself among those
translate: But as each is snuffed out one by one, you are thankful to not count yourself among them

original: The sky is your temple and the howling of wolves your litany
translate: You instead find knowledge lit by the light of the moon and direction from the chorus of howling wolves

original: Distribute points to your PRIMARY ATTRIBUTES and SKILLS
translate: Distribute points to your PRIMARY ATTRIBUTES and SKILLS

original: These go a long way towards defining your character mechanically
translate: These go a long way towards defining your character mechanically

original: Secondary attributes that tend to vary during play
translate: Secondary attributes that tend to vary during play

original: Skills are derived from primary attributes and are used to perform most non-combat tasks in the game
translate: Skills are derived from primary attributes and are used to perform most non-combat tasks in the game

original: Describes how tough and resilient a character is
translate: Describes how tough and resilient a character is

original: Derived attributes that are used during combat
translate: Derived attributes that are used during combat

original: Describes the percentage of Hits that are upgraded to Critical Hits
translate: Describes the percentage of Hits that are upgraded to Critical Hits

original: For each successful Attack, there is a chance the Hit is upgraded to a Critical Hit
translate: For each successful Attack, there is a chance the Hit is upgraded to a Critical Hit

original: This is a percentage chance equal to the attacker’s Crit Chance Attribute
translate: This is a percentage chance equal to the attacker’s Crit Chance Attribute

original: If a Critical Hit is confirmed, the Damage dealt is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit. value
translate: If a Critical Hit is confirmed, the Damage dealt is multiplied by the Weapon’s Crit. value

original: For instance a Weapon with a Crit. value of, multiplies the Damage dealt in a Critical Hit by
translate: For instance a Weapon with a Crit. value of, multiplies the Damage dealt in a Critical Hit by

original: This is added to the current weapon's damage range for a total damage range
translate: This is added to the current weapon's damage range for a total damage range

original: Defences are used to defend against attacks and negative effects
translate: Defences provide protection against attacks and from negative effects

original: Willpower describes a character’s ability to withstand mind-affecting conditions such as those caused by spells
translate: Represents the amount of fortitude a character possesses: that is to say their ability to withstand mind-affecting conditions, such as those caused by spells

original: Counts encumberance from Armor and Footwear
translate: Counts encumbrance from Armour and Footwear

original: These are the Feats derived from your class
translate: These are the Feats derived from your class

original: Distribute your Development Points in them to gain benefits and new Abilities
translate: Distribute your Development Points in them to gain benefits and new Abilities

original: Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage
translate: Your Charges cause 1-3 additional Blunt Damage

original: Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack
translate: Killing an opponent using a Heavy Melee Weapon restores 1 Attack

original: Your Critical Hits using Blades cause Bleeding on your target
translate: Your Critical Hits using Blades cause Bleeding on your target

original: Critical Hits with a Club causes The Injured Leg condition
translate: Critical Hits with a Club causes The Injured Leg condition

original: Critical Hits with an Axe causes Injury Conditions
translate: Critical Hits with an Axe causes Injury Conditions

original: If you score a Critical Hit with a Bow, you immediately regain 1 attack
translate: Your Critical Hits with a Bow immediately bestow you 1 Attack

original: The gruesomeness of your Axe-Kill causes the Fear condition in all opponents who can see it
translate: The gruesome ferocity of your Axe-Kills makes all foes who witness it Fearful

original: Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker
translate: Whilst wielding a shield, dodging a melee attack causes you to deal 1-4 Blunt damage to your attacker

original: The maximum number of ranks have been placed for this Feat!
translate: The maximum number of ranks have been placed for this Feat!

original: You don't have any ranks to distribute
translate: You don't have any ranks to distribute

original: You can use this screen to customize your characters physical appearance
translate: You can use this screen to customise your character's physical appearance

original: Note that changes made here are purely cosmetic
translate: Note that changes made here are purely cosmetic

original: Finalize your character by editing their appearance
translate: Finalise your character by editing his or her appearance

original: Name must be between 3 and 10 characters long and may only contain standard English letters (A-Z
translate: Names must be between 3 and 10 characters long and may only contain characters from the standard Latin alphabet used in English (A-Z

original: You must destribute all your attribute points before you can proceed!
translate: You must distribute all your attribute points before proceeding!
